title.narrative: Market Transformation through Introduction of Energy-Efficient Electric Vehicles Project

description.narrative: The project will replace gasoline tricycles (motorcycles with a passenger sidecar) with three wheel plug-in electric vehicles running on an electric motor and rechargeable battery (e-trikes). The project will initiate a transformation of the tricycle subsector by: (i) improving the livelihoods of tricycle drivers through higher incomes and a better work environment; (ii) generating global environmental benefits and reducing the carbon footprint of the tricycle industry through the introduction of low-carbon e-trike technology; and (iii) leveraging private sector participation in the e-trike market.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
Reports and Recommendations of the President
At least 100,000 e-trikes operating by December 2017
